DOC.brief_summary: The main objective trial measure thermogenic effect two different dos whey protein microgels . It randomize crossover double-blind design conduct 20 subject .
DOC.brief_title: Whey Protein Micelles Thermogenesis Overweight Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Primary objective outcome : The primary objective trial measure thermogenic effect two different dos whey protein microgels ( WPM ) . Secondary objective outcome : Explore mechanism action WPM thermogenesis include : Protein turnover response dose source protein ( WPM versus casein ) Insulinemic glycemic response dose source protein ( WPM versus casein ) Design : The propose study randomize double-blind , placebo-controlled , single center , crossover design . At start study , subject randomly assign 4 different group crossover design , ask consume beverage contain Product 1 : 0g protein ( maltodextrin control ) Product 2 : 30g WPM Product 3 : 50g WPM Product 4 : 50g micellar casein ( MC ) Number subject : The number subject 15 . Sufficient subject recruit provide 30 % drop-out rate . Therefore 20 subject need include drop-outs .
DOC.criteria: Overweight ( BMI range 25.0 29.9 kg per m2 Healthy Having obtain his/her subject 20 year inform consent . Chronic acute disease affect protein metabolism ( diabetes , renal insufficiency , CVD , liver disease ) , dyslipidemia History varicose venous stases Recent major surgery ( 3 month ) History major gastrointestinal surgery ( gastric bypass , intestinal resection etc… ) Malabsorption disorder History cancer within past year Significant weight loss last 3 month Food allergy , especially cow milk protein . Pregnancy lactation Special diet especially vegetarian , high protein ( ≥ 1.6 g/kg ) weight loss program Abnormal Food Frequency Questionnaire Aversion vanilla chocolate aroma Smoking Moderate intense physical activity > 2 hours/week Hematocrit < 40 male < 36 female Blood donation within 3 month study start 3 month study end Regular consumption medication supplement i.e . treatment affect thermogenesis nutrient metabolism general corticosteroid , insulin , androgen , antibiotic nutritional supplement ( multivitamin , protein shake ) . Have high alcohol consumption ( 1 drink/day ) Consumption illicit drug Subject expect comply study procedure , include consume test product . Currently participate participate another clinical trial last 4 week prior begin study .
